audio_item.dc.title: Sound Recording - Mrs. (Anna) Andrew Carlson, Hoxeyville, 1st half - 1956 September 19

A single tape may yield multiple audio files if there were variations in tape stock, speed, or channels (i.e. stereo or mono). audio_item.dc.abstract: [Side 1] : [Part 1] : Part 1; Interview on the subject of life in Northern Michigan (Manistee area) in the late 19th and early 20th century.
